content:
/>
IV.i.2.E.3.a
.
Who Is Eligible for Pre-Discharge Examination
Pre-Discharge claim submission is available to service members with no more
than 180 days remaining until discharge.
References
:  For more information on
who may file a pre-discharge claim, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.A.1.b
, and
claims that are not processed prior to discharge, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.B.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E - Examinations in Special Situations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section E
